author: IGN
description: Check out the Keys of Fury launch trailer for this retro-style beat 'em up typing game. Master the art of key-fu as you battle your way through warehouses, construction sites, factories, and other wild locations—facing off against robust robots, nimble ninjas, vain vegetable vendors, and other fierce foes in Story Mode. Typos hurt, so prioritize accuracy over speed to achieve a flawless victory! Build up Fury to unleash powerful screen-clearing combos that automatically complete worrisome words. You can also test your skills in Arcade Mode or create your own stage with mod support. Keys of Fury is available now on Steam.
title: Keys of Fury: Typing Action - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Escape From Tarkov's 1.0 version reviewed by Travis Northup on PC.



Escape From Tarkov is the extraction shooter that started it all, and many of its dense, mercurial systems are fascinating to learn and master at your own pace as it viciously refuses to hold your hand. I genuinely love that unapologetic challenge, but an equal number of things about it are obnoxious, janky, or just plain scuffed to an unacceptable degree – that includes its subpar performance and bugginess, its absolutely atrocious UI, and its unmitigated plague of cheaters. There is still a stellar, tense, and realistic FPS with one of the best progression treadmills ever made buried underneath all that, feeding you interesting things to do for hundreds of hours. But if the jankiness doesn’t entirely smother its promise, the absurd pay-to-win options that completely undermine much of Tarkov’s difficulty come very close. There are still plenty of good times to be found for those with the gumption to push past a who
title: Escape From Tarkov Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Ready or Not 2: Here I Come trailer for this upcoming film starring Samara Weaving, Kathryn Newton, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Shawn Hatosy, Néstor Carbonell, David Cronenberg, Elijah Wood, Kevin Durand, Olivia Cheng, Varun Saranga, and Daniel Beirne. Ready or Not 2: Here I Come opens in theaters in spring 2026.

Moments after surviving an all-out attack from the Le Domas family, Grace (Samara Weaving) discovers she’s reached the next level of the nightmarish game — and this time with her estranged sister Faith (Kathryn Newton) at her side. Grace has one chance to survive, keep her sister alive, and claim the High Seat of the Council that controls the world. Four rival families are hunting her for the throne, and whoever wins rules it all.

Ready or Not 2: Here I Come is produced by Tripp Vinson, James Vanderbilt, William Sherak, and Bradley J. Fischer.

It is written and directed by Guy Busick & R. Christopher Murphy. It is directed by Matt Bettinelli-Olpin & Tyler Gillett.
title: Ready or Not 2: Here I Come - Official Trailer (2026) Elijah Wood, Samara Weaving

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Version 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer for Netherworld Covenant, a roguelike tactical soulslike game developed by MadGoat. Players will rise to the occasion to become a formidable warrior who wields the power of the Nether Lantern. Traverse to the edge of the mortal and netherworld realms to fight alongside fallen souls with energetic combat and a soulslike style. Netherworld Covenant is launching into Version 1.0 on December 9 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Netherworld Covenant - Official Version 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Red Dead Redemption is finally available on more platforms than ever, this includes the PS5, XBOX Series, Switch 2, and even a mobile version that can be accessed via a Netflix subscription or a standard purchase. 
While every console and PC version of this newly enhanced Red Dead Redemption includes 60FPS, enhanced image quality, and HDR support all wrapped in a nice 4K package. The Netflix and Mobile versions feature a lower resolution and frame rate, but hey…that’s a pretty fair trade off for Red Dead Redemption to run on a cell phone. 

In this video we compare the graphics of the PC version with the settings turned all the way up, to the Netflix version played on an iPhone 17 Pro Max. 

Gameplay captured on a PC via a GTX 5090 and an iPhone 17 Pro Max plugged into a capture card.

#IGN #gaming #RedDeadRedemption
title: Red Dead Redemption - Netflix iOS vs PC Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description: Check out the release date trailer for Dead Format, a survival horror game developed by Katanalevy. It's 1990s Scotland, and your brother has gone missing after becoming obsessed with a mysterious new VHS format. Follow his trail through the tapes and uncover why the government wants to ban "Video Ghastlies". Watching these tapes is dangerous. Some things aren’t meant to be recorded… and now, they’re watching you back. Dead Format will be available on PC (Steam) on December 10.
title: Dead Format - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Kingdom of Night is available now on PC via Steam, GOG, Humble Store, and itch.io. Watch the Kingdom of Night launch trailer for this 80s-themed, isometric action-RPG to see demons you'll slay, combat, class-based customization, and more. Set off for the remote town of Miami, Arizona, where cosmic forces invade everyday teenage life in Kingdom of Night.
title: Kingdom of Night - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season of Divine Intervention Gameplay Trailer for Diablo 4, the hit action RPG developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Players can get a look at the upcoming season as players will seize the power of Divine Gifts to take on the tormented Lesser Evils. Engage with a suite of new improvements such as enhanced monster combat, a reworked item journey, and more. The Season of Divine Intervention for Diablo 4 is launching on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Battlenet).

#IGN #gaming #Diablo4
title: Diablo 4 - Official Season of Divine Intervention Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 2026 Updates Teaser Trailer for Ball x Pit, the hit action arcade roguelike bullet hell game developed by Kenny Sun and Friends. Players will get a sneak peek at new updates coming in the new year, with new characters, balls, passives, evolutions, and more. The Regal Update is slated for January 2026, a Shadow Update launching in April 2026, and a Naturalist Update set to be released in July 2026. Ball x Pit is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Ball x Pit - Official 2026 Updates Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The world of Spartacus is back in "Spartacus: House of Ashur" and we held a special screening to give Spartacus fans an exclusive first look at the first two episodes. 

Season One of “Spartacus: House of Ashur” debuts December 5, 2025, with a special two- episode premiere. New episodes will be available to stream weekly on Fridays only on the STARZ app, all STARZ streaming and on-demand platforms, in addition to its linear debut.

The first four chapters in the “Spartacus” franchise (“Spartacus: Blood and Sand,” “Spartacus: Gods of the Arena,” “Spartacus: Vengeance” and “Spartacus: War of the Damned”) are all available on the STARZ app, all STARZ streaming and on-demand platforms

“Spartacus: House of Ashur” is a thrilling, erotic, history-bending, roller-coaster experience that
builds on everything that made the original series a colossal hit. What if Ashur lived, and the
Romans rewarded his treachery with the gladiator school where he once bled? Welcome to the
House of Ashur. No lo
title: "There's More Blood and I Love it!" - Audience React to Spartacus: House of Ashur

author: IGN
description:
Brian Altano sat down with Ashur Star, Nick E. Tarabay, and Showrunner / Executive Producer Steven S. DeKnight to chat about "Spartacus: House of Ashur". Spartacus fans and audience members also got to participate and ask their own questions about the show, the process and what it takes to be Ashur himself. 

Season One of “Spartacus: House of Ashur” debuts December 5, 2025, with a special two- episode premiere. New episodes will be available to stream weekly on Fridays only on the STARZ app, all STARZ streaming and on-demand platforms, in addition to its linear debut.

The first four chapters in the “Spartacus” franchise (“Spartacus: Blood and Sand,” “Spartacus: Gods of the Arena,” “Spartacus: Vengeance” and “Spartacus: War of the Damned”) are all available on the STARZ app, all STARZ streaming and on-demand platforms

“Spartacus: House of Ashur” is a thrilling, erotic, history-bending, roller-coaster experience that builds on everything that made the original series a colossal hit.
title: Spartacus: House of Ashur - Q&A with the Fans of Spartacus

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Gameplay Dev Reacts and Insights' Beyond the Light Episode 1 for 007 First Light, a third-person action-adventure game based on the acclaimed James Bond IP developed by IO Interactive. 

Players can experience the early years of James Bond on daring missions, intense shootouts, and suave espionage as he rises from an M16 rookie to donning the elusive 007 title. Hear from Andreas Krogh, Gameplay Director, and Thomas Pulluelo, Senior Level Designer, on how the public received the first look at 007 First Light alongside the process of crafting the origin story of the British icon. 

007 First Light is launching on March 27, 2026, for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #007 #DevDiary
title: 007 First Light - Official 'Gameplay Dev Reacts and Insights' Beyond the Light Episode 1

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Zenitsu Character Trailer for Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2, an anime 3D fighting game developed by CyberConnect2. Players can see Zenitsu in action as his blade cuts through any adversary in his path. 

Fight as Zenitsu Agatsuma, as featured in Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle in Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2, available now as DLC for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #DemonSlayerKimetsuNoYaiba #Zenitsu
title: Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Zenitsu Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect from Sea of Thieves Season 18: Return to The Devil's Roar in this latest trailer for the online pirate action RPG. 

The Eternal Guard foes arrive, along with Sanctuaries of the Banished areas to explore, loot, and more in the new content update coming to Sea of Thieves in Season 18. Sea of Thieves Season 18: Return to The Devil's Roar begins on December 11, 2025.

#IGN #SeaOfThieves #ActionRPG
title: Sea of Thieves Season 18 - Official Content Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 35 minutes of gameplay from the Another Eden x Final Fantasy 9 crossover event in this gameplay trailer. Step once more into the world of Alexandria, and watch as iconic Final Fantasy 9 characters join the fight in this crossover for the single-player adventure JRPG. See familiar faces and memorable Final Fantasy characters in action as Zidane, Vivi, Garnet, and Steiner become playable characters in Another Eden's "Memories of Another Sky" event. The Another Eden x Final Fantasy 9 crossover event, "Memories of Another Sky," begins today, Wednesday, December 3 PST / Thursday, December 4 JST / Thursday, December 4 UTC, and runs until Tuesday, December 23 at 14:59 UTC.

Another Eden is available now on Steam for PC, iOS via the App Store, and Android via Google Play.

The event features new mechanics that pay homage to Final Fantasy 9, including new Support Abilities for Zidane, Garnet, Vivi, and Steiner. You can equip them with Magic Stones to unleash various effects, experime
title: Another Eden x Final Fantasy 9 - Official 'Memories of Another Sky' Event Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Forge Mastery, Relics, and Charms Early Access Update Overview Trailer for Titan Quest 2, an isometric action hack-and-slash RPG developed by Grimlore Games. 

Players will get the rundown on the 40 Charms and Relics being added with the latest update that tweaks gameplay and lays the groundwork for future content for Titan Quest 2. 

The all-new mastery with Forge allows players to reinforce weapons and armor mid-combat, use Damage Reflection as a build-direction, and more. The Forge Mastery, Relics, and Charms Early Access Update also adds multiplayer support, German localization, and more, with it being available now for PC.

#IGN #TitanQuest2 #EarlyAccess
title: Titan Quest 2 - Official Forge Mastery, Relics, and Charms Early Access Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Enjoy this (mostly) cinematic new trailer for Arms of God, the upcoming solo-developed fantasy/sci-fi roguelite autoshooter with Doom-y vibes. A playable demo is available on Steam today. Check it out if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3100310/Arms_of_God/
title: Arms of God - Demo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the December Spec 3 1.65 Update Trailer for Gran Turismo 7, the latest addition to the iconic racing simulation franchise developed by Polyphony Digital. 

Players can soon get their hands on the new December Spec 3 1.65 Update, packed with the new Power Pack Add-on, Data Logger, tracks, and more. The update allows racers to get behind the wheel of the 2023 Ferrari 296 GT3, the 2022 Ferrari 296 GTB, Mine's BNR34 GT-R N1 Base, the Gran Turismo F3500-B, the 1985 Fiat Panda 30 CL, the 2026 Polestar 5 Performance, the 1997 Mitsubishi FTO GP Version R, and the 1995 Renault ESpace F1. 

The December Spec 3 1.65 Update for Gran Turismo 7 is launching on December 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GranTurismo7 #Racing
title: Gran Turismo 7 - Official December Spec 3 1.65 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Erangel Subzero Begins' Launch Trailer for PUBG: Battlegrounds, the hit battle royale shooter developed by PUBG Studio. 

Players can explore a version of the Erangel map that has been covered in snow and frozen over after mysterious satellites crash. Search these crash sites for valuable loot and engage with some gun stat adjustments and new content to enjoy. The 'Erangel Subzero' event is available now for PC and launching on December 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #PUBG #BattleRoyale
title: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Official 'Erangel Subzero Begins' Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Power Pack Trailer for Gran Turismo 7, the hit simulation racing game developed by Polyphony Digital. 

Players can soon access the Power Pack Add-on, offering a new way to race with a specific set of racing challenges that pays homage to the history of racing and vehicles themselves. Race against the latest iteration of GT Sophy and take on the challenge in the Power Pack for Gran Turismo 7, launching on December 4 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GranTurismo7 #Racing
title: Gran Turismo 7 - Official Power Pack Trailer

author: IGN
description: Dystopika, the chill cyberpunk city-builder, is dropping a new DLC called B-Sides. It includes new props like hanging gardens and monorails, a new utility district, new holograms, a new megastructure, a new district called Rustport, and more! It's available now. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379910/Dystopika/
title: Dystopika - Official B-Sides DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
28 Years Later: The Bone Temple expands the world created by Danny Boyle and Alex Garland, but turns it on its head! 

Dr. Kelson (Ralph Fiennes) finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's (Alfie Williams) encounter with Jimmy Crystal (Jack O'Connell) becomes a nightmare he can't escape. 

Directed by Nia DaCosta, 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple will explore the changes in the infected and the survivors in this brutal world.

28 Years Later: The Bone Temple releases January 16th 2026. 

#IGN #28YearsLater #Horror
title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple - Official Trailer 2 (2026) Alfie Williams, Jack O'Connell

author: IGN
description: What happens when the world of Destiny's light and darkness collide with that of Star Wars? You get Destiny 2: Renegades, an expansion to the long running live service game that adds a hefty amount of on-the-nose Star Wars inspriation to the game. Bungie, working closely with Luscasfilm Games, has launched the first post Light and Darkness saga, allowing players to experience Destiny 2 in a more traditional Star Wars stroy-telling narrative, mixed with gameplay elements that help you feel like the two worlds have collided in a major way. Here's 30 minutes of Destiny 2: Renegades gameplay.
title: Destiny 2: Renegades - 30 Minutes of Star Wars Inspired Gameplay
